wikitext.*:
<noinclude>Only for {{tl|hideN}}</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgCloserButton) || !$wgCloserButton}--><!--{assign var="wgCloserButton" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function(){
    $(window).on('load', function(){
        (function exec(){
            var e = $('.closerButton .mw-collapsible-toggle');
            if (!e[0]) return setTimeout(exec, 1000);
            e.css('float', 'none').each(function() {
                $(this).appendTo($(this).parent());
            });
        })()
    });
});</script><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
